title: The Big Ten and Pac-12 Cancel Fall Football Seasons | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
The Big Ten, Pac-12, and several smaller conferences have announced they are canceling their fall sports seasons. We discuss what this means for college football's immediate and long-term future, what will happen to the remaining Power Five conferences, what college football will look like when it returns, how this impacts the NFL season, the NFL draft, college prospects, and more. 
Host: Kevin Clark
Guest: Rodger Sherman and Danny Kelly
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
